scenario: Open Shipment Overview with active shipments
precondition: User account has at least one active shipment
given: I am a logged-in operations user
when: I open the Shipment Overview page from the main navigation
then: I see a table listing my active shipments with columns: Booking No, Customer Reference, POL, POD, ETD, ETA, Service, Status, Container Count
notes: Covers base happy path for Shipment Overview.

scenario: Open Shipment Overview with no active shipments
precondition: User account has no active shipments
given: I am a logged-in operations user
when: I open the Shipment Overview page from the main navigation
then: I see an empty state message explaining that there are no active shipments instead of a blank table

given: I am a logged-in operations user
when: I open the Shipment Overview page
then: I see a generic error banner with guidance to contact support, and no outdated shipment data is displayed

precondition: User has active shipments with ETD in different future dates
given: I am a logged-in operations user on the Shipment Overview page
when: I view the Shipment Overview without changing any filters
then: I see only shipments with ETD within the next 7 days sorted by ETD ascending

scenario: No shipments in upcoming departures window
precondition: User has shipments but none with ETD in the next 7 days
given: I am a logged-in operations user on the Shipment Overview page
when: I view the default upcoming departures view
then: I see a 'No results' or appropriate empty-state message indicating no shipments match the default range
notes: Edge case for date window with no matches.

scenario: Paginate large upcoming departures result set
precondition: User has more than 100 shipments with ETD within the next 7 days
given: I am a logged-in operations user on the Shipment Overview page
when: I scroll to the bottom of the shipment list or navigate to the next page
then: I can access additional shipments beyond the first 100 using pagination or lazy loading without errors
notes: Performance and UX check for large result sets.
